title: Is Keity's Friend Setting Herself Up For Failure By Dating This Poly Man?
description:
You've never had an interest in being in a polyamorous relationship until the right guy came along. He's everything you've always looked for in a man, but he's in relationship with multiple women.
Do you take a chance to create a bond with him or not? In this case, Keity's friend is going all in, but she's worried about her.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
